name: Visions (Champ125)
description:
Play as a handless heister looking for a diamond, navigate through a maze of hidden lasers which can only be seen with "laser vision" activated, and robot enemies who don't particularly like you.

With a simple vector graphics style and 2 catchy chiptunes playing along in the background, and importantly, entertaining high octane gameplay which still requires a bit of strategy and thought, visions is a high-quality game for the timespan it was made in.

Can you finish all 5 levels?

made by Champ125 and Soviet_oynyon.
